content.rendered:
Transform Your Logistics Experience with TrueLog

From global freight forwarding to specialized compliance services, our innovative solutions are tailored to meet your unique needs. Discover the TrueLog difference today!

View Services

IOR/EOR Solutions

We combine multiple small shipments, sharing transportation costs and delivering major savings.

IT Asset Management

Streamline your import and export operations with freight forwarders, saving time and reducing costs of logistics seamlessly.

Global Fulfilment

Enjoy faster customs clearance and deferred duty payments, ensuring your goods aren't delayed.

Enquire now

Blank Form (#3)
Years of Experience
0 +

At TrueLog

We redefine excellence in global logistics supply chain and ICT solutions.

At TrueLog Pte Ltd, we go beyond mere logistics; we craft seamless, end-to-end solutions tailored specifically for the Information and Communications Technology (ICT) sector.

Our expertise spans the essential spectrum of logistics services, including sophisticated freight forwarding, comprehensive Importer of Record (IOR) & Exporter of Record (EOR) services, meticulous compliance consulting, and dedicated global fulfilment services.
DIscover More

Our Company In Number

Offices & Logistic Facilities
0
Countries Worldwide

Our Services

Elevating Your Global Supply Chain

Effortless logistics, optimised operations, and cutting-edge technology for seamless international trade.

Freight Forwarding

Comprehensive sea and air freight services ensuring safe, efficient transportation.
Learn more

Global Fulfilment

Efficient, end-to-end supply chain management ensuring timely and accurate worldwide delivery.
Learn more

ICT Logistics

Specialized logistics solutions for technology hardware, ensuring compliance and efficiency.
Learn more

IOR/EOR Solutions

Streamlined importer and exporter services ensuring global compliance for IT equipment.
Learn more
98%

LATAM

Supply Chain Technology & Customized Solutions

Transforming Logistics with Our Turnkey Solutions Across Regions

At TrueLog, we set the standard for efficiency in global logistics and ICT solutions across APAC, Europe, the Middle East, Africa, and LATAM. As an industry leader, we specialize in logistics services, supply chain management, and Value-Added Services (VAS) tailored to the unique demands of these dynamic markets.

With deep regional expertise, we streamline operations, optimize costs, and ensure seamless cross-border movements, empowering businesses to expand effortlessly. We don’t just solve challenges—we drive business transformation with precision, speed, and reliability in every solution we deliver.

Discover More

Why Choose Us

Experience the benefits of TrueLog Advantage

We redefine excellence in global logistics with unmatched efficiency and precision. Our comprehensive solutions are designed to streamline your operations and provide seamless support for your business.

First-Time Customs Clearance

Seamless clearance with IOR and EOR solutions.

Direct Delivery

IT infrastructure delivered to your chosen data center.

Single Point of Contact

Project management from a single shipment to a global rollout.

Global Trade Compliance

Access to compliance advisory services and a vast compliance database.

Your Industry, Our Expertise: Global Freight Forwarding Solutions

Connect with Our Experts Today!

Schedule a call, book a meeting, or reach out with your questions—we’re here to help.
Get a Free Consultation

Our Knowledge

Learn insight & Industry News

Stay updated with the latest trends and developments in the logistics and supply chain industry.

Client Success Stories

Hear what our clients say about working with us

"Aakash DhunaHad a wonderful experience working with TrueLog. - highly recommend!"
Aakash Dhuna
"I was very impressed with the whole process and all of the staff that were involved behind the scenes in making all the deliveries run so smoothly.."
Melissa J. T
"TrueLog has been instrumental in streamlining our global shipping operations. Their sea freight services are top-notch, ensuring our goods arrive on time and in perfect condition. The team’s expertise in handling complex shipments has been invaluable to our business."
James LOperations Manager

Accreditations & Certifications

“Our mission is to be a flexible, competitive and trustworthy logistics provider, offering added value in a swift manner to our clients.
We take great pride in providing you with the best solution. Your word of mouth is what makes us grow and excel.”
